name: Space Drifter (RokKos, alekzs)
description:
Controls:

Click to pick up the planet, click again to place it. No drag & drop - that is for babies. Real Drifters click.

Story

You are what remains of the human civilization. Lone survivors, drifting across the vast blackness of space. 

Take destiny into your own hands by placing celestial bodies to aid your lone ship. Change the gravity and launch yourself among the stars!

Disclaimer:
Online leaderboard fails to work on itch.io because of lack of https (dreamlo stuff). We will upload a fixed build later (or possibly never), but please be a good sport and notify us of your highscores in the comments. Thanks!

Credits:

Wanna Be Physics Master: Aleksander Gregorka

Planet Hunter: Rok Kos

Assets used:

- Space Ship: https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-spaceships

- Planets: https://norma-2d.itch.io/celestial-objects-pixel-art-pack

- Main Menu music: DOS-88 - Far Away (https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library)

- Main Theme music:  Race to Mars (https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library)

- Explosion SFX: https://freesound.org/people/EFlexMusic/sounds/393374/

- Place SFX: https://freesound.org/people/ryusa/sounds/467563/
